law.catch_line: The health officer for a county is entitled to:...

text.section:
The health officer for a county is entitled to:
The salary provided in the State budget;
Reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget; and
Any additional salary that the county provides.
Except as otherwise provided by law, each health officer is a special appointment in the State Personnel Management System.
